attributes.action: england should get to vote whether to stay in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Scotland have been given a chance to vote whether they what to say in the UK or not but no other country in the UK was given the choice to have their say. i think all members should also have the right to say whether they want to be apart of the UK just like Scotland did  .

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition title: England To Leave The UK Referendum

Created by: Jon Mitchell

Closing: 30/03/2015
